title: HAUNTED
description:
Language: English, Russian
Genre: Adventure / 3D

Spending time in search of his missing sister, a girl named Maria 

discovers he can see ghosts and understand their language. 

Gradually collecting the crumbs of the facts, it is getting closer and 

closer approaches to solving the terrible secrets of the past, which is 

somehow connected with the laboratory of Dr. Lindsay Ashford.

Features
Incredibly intriguing story on the ghosts.
In the center of attention - the girl detective and a crazy professor.
Detailed graphics.
Unique game events.

Features of release
Haunted
Do not recode
Left only the highest quality texture
Sewn crack text from ZoG Forum Team v2.0

How to change language:
1. Extract and open crack folder
2. Open file ALI213.ini/SKIDROW.ini/3DM.ini with notepad
3. find this line "Language = russian" edit it to "Language = english"

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium IV - 3.0 GHz / AMD Athlon XP - 2.4 GHz
RAM: 1 GB
Video Card: 256 MB
Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
Hard disk space: 5.6 GB

By Doug Stamper.
